pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PornHub Unofficial APIUnofficial API for pornhub.com in Python## Usage#### Create client```pythonimport pornhubclient = pornhub.PornHub()```#### Create client with proxy ```pythonimport pornhubclient = pornhub.PornHub("5.135.164.72", 3128)#With proxy, given a Proxy IP and Port. For the countries with restricted access like Turkey, etc.```#### Grab stars```pythonfor star in client.getStars(10): print(star) print(star["name"])```#### Create client with search keywords```pythonkeywords = ["word1", "word2"]client = pornhub.PornHub(keywords)for video in client.getVideos(10,page=2): print(video) print(video["url"])```## LicenseMIT license
